title: Dancing Lights
content:
Dancing Lights Evocation Cantrip Illuminate a 9m radius. 10 turns 18m Concentration Action

Evocation Cantrip

Illuminate a 9m radius.

18m Concentration

Dancing Lights is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Dancing Lights is a Cantrip from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Dancing Lights Information
